channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why Trump’s Venezuela strike may have been about Cuba as much as it was about oil
item.description: Nicolas Maduro’s capture has effectively taken away Cuba’s closest ally.

item.title: Michael Bloomberg and Warren Buffett agree on advice to Gen Z: Choose vibes over money in your job search
item.description: Bloomberg took a lower salary for his first job out of school because he preferred the people who interviewed him.

item.title: Meta Ray-Ban Display Smart Glasses Are Delayed, Company Admits
item.description: If you’re waiting to buy Meta Ray-Ban Display outside the U.S., the company has just announced the global rollout planned for early 2026 is now on hol...

item.title: Google billionaire Larry Page copies the Jeff Bezos playbook, buying a $173 million Miami compound that will save him millions in taxes
item.description: Critics warned a wealth tax in California would lead to a billionaire exodus. Florida says come on in, the water's warm.

item.title: Apple Releases Surprise iPhone Software Update For Millions Of Users
item.description: There’s a new test update for the iPhone which nobody saw coming.

item.title: Everybody Is Using AI. Why Aren’t Businesses Seeing Meaningful Returns?
item.description: Enteprise AI pilots are not delivering ROI for businesses due to leadership and workflow issues. How businesses can use AI to deliver productivity and...

item.title: Soundpeats Unveils Aura Nebula True Wireless Earbuds With Hi-Fi Sound And Five Drivers
item.description: Set to launch this spring and priced at $200, the Aura Nebula earbuds are aimed at critical listeners who want high resolution, detail and a spacious ...

item.title: I’m the SolarWinds CEO. Here’s why a $4.4 billion move to go private was right for us
item.description: Looking back, the deal succeeded not because we pushed harder or moved faster, but because we stayed balanced.

item.title: Apple’s iPhone 4 Is Suddenly Back—What You Need To Know
item.description: This wildly popular iPhone makes a surprise return after 15 years — but should you get one?

item.title: Why whatever’s happening in Venezuela isn’t ‘regime change’
item.description: Regime change refers to something far more ambitious and far more consequential than plucking out a single leader.

item.title: IRS announces start date of 2026 tax filing season: what to know
item.description: IRS announces 2026 tax filing season begins Jan. 26, with Free File program starting Jan. 9 for taxpayers earning $84,000 or less, while taxpayers hav...

What if you had invested in Berkshire Hathaway at the start of Buffett’s career?
IRS sets opening day for tax season — two weeks from Monday
Trump wants oil at $50. Drillers may not want to help him get there.

item.title: Private sector added fewer-than-expected 41,000 jobs in December, ADP says
item.description: The figure reported on Wednesday is below economists’ estimates of an increase of 47,000 jobs and higher than the prior month’s revised reading of a l...

item.title: Dallas mayor predicts 'avalanche' of NYC financial firms fleeing new socialist policies under Mamdani
item.description: Dallas Mayor Eric Johnson predicts financial firms will flee New York City for Texas as the Big Apple's new mayor pursues socialist policies.

item.title: New vehicle sales to decline moderately in 2026 as affordability issues weigh, forecast says
item.description: Cox Automotive forecasts U.S. vehicle sales will decline 2.4% to 15.8 million units in 2026, with fleet sales dropping 6.1% as auto market slows.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
